description: This file contains a React component named AdminDashboard that provides an administrative interface to manage products, including creating and viewing products. It interacts with an API service to fetch and post product data.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of products from the API and updates the state, using placeholder data if the fetch fails.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a new product to the API and updates the product list, handling errors by displaying a message and adding a placeholder product.
